title: Harry S. Truman on Political Correctness
subtitle: Rumor: President Harry S. Truman in 1945 described political correctness as 'a doctrine fostered by a delusional, illogical minority.'
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: President Harry S. Truman in 1945 described political correctness as “a doctrine fostered by a delusional, illogical minority.”
